category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Processing_Summary_Mail_Notifiers
preference.preference_description: Specifies the additional email IDs to be notified for a success or failure message after International Material Data System (IMDS) file processing is completed. If no value is specified, only the user who initiated the process receives success and failure notifications. There is no default value.
